skills.skill: Internet technologies (HTML, DHTML, XML, CSS, XSLT, SOAP, WSDL, SOA)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, maintain, and enhance IT applications utilizing Oracle PL/SQL.
Interface with clients at all organizational levels and translate business requirements into technical work for end-users.
Write complex queries, use advanced PL/SQL concepts, and perform performance tuning.
Assist in defect triage, impact analysis, and resolution planning.
Analyze and convert business requirements to technical requirements, followed by designing and implementing the solutions.
Review Oracle ADDM and AWR reports and recommend query optimization based on the analysis.
Leverage Oracle 12C features on a large-scale multi-terabyte system.
Support team members in understanding data and meeting user requirements.
Participate in project work groups to understand data specific needs and perform performance tuning activities.
Provide production deployment and support as needed.
Participate in all aspects of the software development life cycle and work in an agile, rapid development and deployment environment.
Demonstrate strong written, oral, and interpersonal communication skills.
Conduct research into software-related issues and products.
Work independently and in a collaborative environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline preferred.
Training or Certification on Oracle PL/SQL Language is an added plus.
